title: Man accidentally shoots himself outside gas station
content:
ALBEMARLE COUNTY, Va, (NEWSPLEX) -- Around 6 p.m. Albemarle County police responded to a call about a man who shot himself in the leg outside of a Citgo gas station near Scottsville.
Police say they arrived quickly, applied a tourniquet, and rushed the man to the University of Virginia Health System for treatment.
Police say they are unsure how the man shot himself but his injuries not life threatening.
The investigation is ongoing.
